item.backtobed.returner.tooltip.function: Hold right-click for [%1%f] sec. to teleport to your bed.
item.backtobed.returner.condition.telepo: This returner doesn't work in this dimension
item.backtobed.returner.condition.no_res: No respawn point set, teleportation failed
item.backtobed.returner.condition.no_acc: Unable to reach your bed, it may be destroyed
_item.backtobed.magical_returner.tooltip: Includes your mount in the teleport if you’re riding.
